sentences:
The Macquarie Island Station is a permanent Australian subantarctic research base on Macquarie Island , commonly called Macca , situated in the Southern Ocean and located approximately halfway between mainland Australia and Antarctica , managed by the Australian Antarctic Division ( AAD ) .
The station lies at the base of Wireless Hill , between two bays on the isthmus at the northern end of the island .
The island and its surrounding waters are administered as a nature reserve by the Tasmanian Government Parks and Wildlife Service .
In 1997 the island was inscribed on the UNESCO World Heritage List as a site of major geoconservation significance , being the only place on earth where rocks from the earth 's mantle are actively exposed above sea - level .
